TopicTitle: The KSP Community My Little Pony Megathread

Articles.Content: I have seen that image before. I quite like it.

Showdown!
Why on God's good Earth (or Kerbin) is this thread in the KERBAL SPACE PROGRAM FORUM?

You mean the "off-topic" forum? Where posts that don't have to do with Kerbal Space Program go?

I just can't understand why a group of people with a common interest would have the audacity to make a thread about another common interest they share and then keep to that thread when discussing that topic. The NERVE!

Yeah, I mean before we know it there'll be an ORBITER thread, just imagine it...

Edited August 31, 2012 by CarolRawley
Thread, thread..... not Forum

Why on God's good Earth (or Kerbin) is this thread in the KERBAL SPACE PROGRAM FORUM?

I don't see the problem as long as it's kept in here. You should have seen the forums pre-pony thread. Image macros everywhere.

were getting off topic

POST PONYS

"I just can't understand why a group of people with a common interest would have the audacity to make a thread about another common interest they share and then keep to that thread when discussing that topic. The NERVE!"

Ah, there's the rub. That is literally the whole reason bronies exist: people came into threads discussion the show only to mock them and drew attention to it. Through their mocking, more people heard of it. Thus, the whole reason why it is popular is because some people couldn't believe that others would watch it, which compelled people to watch it to see why.

Guys, if anyone gives you trouble in this thread, notify a Moderator immediately, use the Report Post function if the offending post breaks the rules.

Myself and the rest of the Moderator team will not tolerate attacks on the fans of My Little Pony, or of any group on the KSP forums for that matter, especially in their own thread.

I thought I had better revisit this with something on-topic, I'm not sure how well known this is, but....
